sqlMap.select: select ID, MEMBER_CODE,CURRENCY, CURRENCY_UNIT, TARGET_CURRENCY, EXCHANGE_RATE,REVERSE_EXCHANGE_RATE, EFFECT_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, OPERATOR,CURRENCY_DESC,CARD_ORG,LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT,LTA_CURRENCY_CODE,START_POINT,END_POINT from TRANSACTION_RATE where 1=1

select ID,MEMBER_CODE, CURRENCY, CURRENCY_UNIT, TARGET_CURRENCY, EXCHANGE_RATE,REVERSE_EXCHANGE_RATE, EFFECT_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, OPERATOR,CURRENCY_DESC,CARD_ORG,LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT,LTA_CURRENCY_CODE,START_POINT,END_POINT from TRANSACTION_RATE where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TRANSACTION_RATE_ID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into TRANSACTION_RATE (ID,MEMBER_CODE, CURRENCY, CURRENCY_UNIT, TARGET_CURRENCY, EXCHANGE_RATE,REVERSE_EXCHANGE_RATE, EFFECT_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, OPERATOR,CURRENCY_DESC,CARD_ORG,LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT,START_POINT,END_POINT ,LTA_CURRENCY_CODE) values (#id:DECIMAL#,#memberCode:VARCHAR#, #currency:VARCHAR#, #currencyUnit:DECIMAL#, #targetCurrency:VARCHAR#, #exchangeRate#,#reverseExchangeRate#, #effectDate:TIMESTAMP#, #expireDate:TIMESTAMP#, #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, #status:CHAR#, #operator:VARCHAR#,#currencyDesc:VARCHAR#, #cardOrg:VARCHAR#,#leastTransAmount:DECIMAL#,#startPoint:DECIMAL#,#endPoint:DECIMAL#,#ltaCurrencyCode:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update:
update TRANSACTION_RATE
CURRENCY = #currency:VARCHAR#
CURRENCY_UNIT = #currencyUnit:DECIMAL#
TARGET_CURRENCY = #targetCurrency:VARCHAR#
MEMBER_CODE = #memberCode:VARCHAR#
EXCHANGE_RATE = #exchangeRate:DECIMAL#
REVERSE_EXCHANGE_RATE = #reverseExchangeRate:VARCHAR#
EFFECT_DATE = #effectDate:TIMESTAMP#
EXPIRE_DATE = #expireDate:TIMESTAMP#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
OPERATOR = #operator:VARCHAR#
CARD_ORG = #cardOrg:VARCHAR#
LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT = #leastTransAmount:DECIMAL#
LTA_CURRENCY_CODE = #ltaCurrencyCode:VARCHAR#
START_POINT = #startPoint:DECIMAL#
END_POINT = #endPoint:DECIMAL#
where ID = #id:DECIMAL#

update TRANSACTION_RATE set STATUS='0' WHERE STATUS=#status:CHAR# and CURRENCY=#currency:VARCHAR# and TARGET_CURRENCY=#targetCurrency:VARCHAR#
MEMBER_CODE=#memberCode:VARCHAR#
CARD_ORG = #cardOrg:VARCHAR#
LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT = #leastTransAmount:DECIMAL#
LTA_CURRENCY_CODE = #ltaCurrencyCode:VARCHAR#
START_POINT = #startPoint:DECIMAL#
END_POINT = #endPoint:DECIMAL#

update TRANSACTION_RATE set EXCHANGE_RATE=#exchangeRate:DECIMAL#
REVERSE_EXCHANGE_RATE=#reverseExchangeRate:VARCHAR#
WHERE STATUS=#status:CHAR# and CURRENCY=#currency:VARCHAR# and TARGET_CURRENCY=#targetCurrency:VARCHAR# and MEMBER_CODE=#memberCode:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select ID,MEMBER_CODE, CURRENCY, CURRENCY_UNIT, TARGET_CURRENCY, EXCHANGE_RATE,REVERSE_EXCHANGE_RATE, EFFECT_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, OPERATOR,CURRENCY_DESC,CARD_ORG,LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT,LTA_CURRENCY_CODE,START_POINT,END_POINT from TRANSACTION_RATE where 1=1 and CURRENCY = #sourceCurrency:VARCHAR# and TARGET_CURRENCY = #targetCurrency:VARCHAR# and MEMBER_CODE = #memberCode:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE > #effectDate:TIMESTAMP#
CREATE_DATE <= #expireDate:TIMESTAMP#
order by id desc

select ID,MEMBER_CODE, CURRENCY, CURRENCY_UNIT, TARGET_CURRENCY, EXCHANGE_RATE,REVERSE_EXCHANGE_RATE, EFFECT_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, OPERATOR,CURRENCY_DESC,CARD_ORG,LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT,START_POINT,END_POINT,LTA_CURRENCY_CODE,START_POINT,END_POINT from TRANSACTION_RATE where 1=1 and CURRENCY = #sourceCurrency:VARCHAR# and TARGET_CURRENCY = #targetCurrency:VARCHAR# and MEMBER_CODE = #memberCode:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #status:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE > #effectDate:TIMESTAMP#
CREATE_DATE <= #expireDate:TIMESTAMP#
CARD_ORG = #cardOrg:VARCHAR#
START_POINT <= #point:DECIMAL#
END_POINT >= #point:DECIMAL#
LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT <=#leastTransAmount:DECIMAL#
order by LEAST_TRANS_AMOUNT desc
